info: Cloud is one of the most vital technologies in the world of development and this is what makes this event so vital. We had several speakers talk to us about GCP, its scope, use cases and the amazing world of cloud computing
An exciting event about a technology which is the bee's knees today!
TensorFlow 2.0 has arrived, with a focus on ease of use, developer productivity, and scalable, production-ready machine learning workloads. And what a party it was!
Google DSC Solutions Challenge is a worldwide Program that calls for Developers, Coders, and learners from all over the world to put their best feet forward in solving a Problem with a Social cause.
The Inaugural Session of DSC HIT
